ygData.subject: RE: Items, Ingredients, Cost and when Trivial
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh heh, gotta get those diamonds out of the economy somehow ;-( Please say it isn t so!  Guild enchanters clamoring me for a gem cutter! Leagnomo ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Heh heh, gotta get those diamonds out of the economy somehow ;-(
Please say it isn't so! Guild enchanters clamoring me for a gem cutter!

Leagnomo

-----Original Message-----
From: Andy Smith [mailto:AndyS@...]
Sent: Monday, November 29, 1999 12:46 PM
To: 'EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Items, Ingredients, Cost and when Trivial


From: Andy Smith <AndyS@...>

To confuse us and provide a way for players to experiment with giving
diamonds away to various NPCs in the vain hope that one of them will return
those diamonds to us in dust form.

-----Original Message-----
From: "Jason Smith" <jj@...>

Anyone know the purpose of the Gem cutter?
